title: Bug 123044 - Preview attached file in PDF and the page break in the first item didn't happen.
description:
Description: When previewing an attached file in PDF format, the page break in the first item doesn't occur. Steps to reproduce:
1. [Please specify the steps to reproduce the issue]
EB: Expected result: The first page should be blank because the first item has the 'pagebreakbefore' property set to 'always'.
SR: Actual result: The page break before action doesn't happen.
